attributes.action: Clear food labelling for Genetically Modified ingredients
attributes.additional_details:
Adequate scientific testing has not yet been carried out on Genetically Modified crops and any possible long term effects it may have on consumers or the environment.

 I believe it is imperative that consumers are given freedom to choose whether they buy products containing GM ingredients, including animal feed.

A clear labelling and symbol system, akin to the nutritional information system, would allow consumers to vote, with informed purchases, whether they want GM ingredients in their food.
